We found this homey restaurant two years ago on a trip to Barcelona.  Back again this year and found same welcoming spirit and good food.  Maurice treated us well and we felt very welcome.  Had paella and prawns and a nice nutty bean salad.  All complimented by a pleasant Martin Códax blanco wine.  Finished it all off with a nicely done Spanish Creme Carmel.  It is worth a visit!
